game.name: Deep Sorrow
game.shortDescription: Deep Sorrow is a horror/adventure game which leads you to a bunker and makes you feel desperate to get out.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deep Sorrow is a horror/adventure game which leads you to a bunker and makes you feel desperate to get out.

reviewHighlights.text: Deep Sorrow is a compact first-person horror adventure that leans heavily on atmosphere, tension, and the unnerving isolation of an underground bunker...
